body.p: An entity shall disclose, in aggregate, the carrying amount of its interests in all individually immaterial joint ventures or associates that are accounted for using the equity method. An entity shall also disclose separately the aggregate amount of its share of those joint ventures’ or associates’:

li.p: profit or loss from continuing operations.
post‑tax profit or loss from discontinued operations.

body.p: An entity provides the disclosures separately for joint ventures and associates.
